name: Touch Instinct
description:
Touch Instinct develops custom mobile applications for iOS, Android and Windows platforms. Our portfolio includes applications optimized for Apple WatchOS and Android Wear wearable devices. Millions of people use applications that we have developed.
In 2017 we improved our rating positions:
became the first Russian app developer company in Clutch.сo rating,
took the first place in Adindex mobile app developers rating,
held the second position in Ruward rating.
became the first Russian development company to become a member of the Application Developers Alliance.
Touch Instinct — Google Developers Certified Agency.
